name: count
description: Counts the number of rows or non-NULL values.

name: countIf
description: Counts the number of rows that match a condition.

name: uniq
description: Approximate number of different values using HyperLogLog.

name: arrayUniq
description: Returns number of unique elements across arrays.

name: groupArrayArray
description: Combines multiple arrays into array of arrays.

name: toInt8
description: Converts input to Int8 data type.

name: toInt16
description: Converts input to Int16 data type.

name: toInt32
description: Converts input to Int32 data type.

name: toInt64
description: Converts input to Int64 data type.

name: toUInt8
description: Converts input to UInt8 data type.

name: toUInt16
description: Converts input to UInt16 data type.

name: toUInt32
description: Converts input to UInt32 data type.

name: toUInt64
description: Converts input to UInt64 data type.

name: toFloat32
description: Converts input to Float32 data type.

name: toFloat64
description: Converts input to Float64 data type.

name: round
description: Rounds number to specified decimal places.

name: exp
description: Returns e raised to the power of x.

name: power
description: Raises a number to the specified power.

name: match
description: Returns whether string matches regex pattern.

name: lengthUTF8
description: Returns string length in Unicode characters.

name: notEmpty
description: Checks if array is not empty.

name: arrayElement
description: Returns array element at specified index.

name: indexOf
description: Returns index of first occurrence of element.

name: toDayOfMonth
description: Extracts day of month from date/datetime.

name: toDayOfWeek
description: Extracts day of week from date/datetime.

name: formatDateTime
description: Formats date/time according to given format.

name: JSONLength
description: Returns length of JSON array or object.

name: rowNumberInAllBlocks
description: Returns row number across all blocks.

name: rowNumberInBlock
description: Returns row number within current block.

name: rank
description: Returns rank of current row with gaps.

name: denseRank
description: Returns rank of current row without gaps.

name: lagInFrame
description: Returns value from previous row in frame.

name: leadInFrame
description: Returns value from next row in frame.

name: firstValue
description: Returns first value in window frame.

name: lastValue
description: Returns last value in window frame.

name: nthValue
description: Returns nth value in window frame.
